heading: Catholic Church. Clergy. Deprivation of the clerical garb.
alt-heading: Deprivation of the clerical garb (Canon law).
Perpetual deprivation of the clerical garb (Canon law).
Temporary deprivation of the clerical garb (Canon law).
general-note: Here are entered works on the penalty by which a cleric is deprived, either temporarily or permanently, of the right of wearing the clerical garb, and other clerical privileges, and is also prohibited from exercising any ecclesiastical ministry..
